The Kitchen a Minecraft realm consisting of multiple worlds. Since its inception, there have been three worlds hosted on this realm: Stovetop, Countertop, and The Pantry.

Prior to the conception of The Kitchen Realm, the Kitchen existed as a private server on CknSoup's Raspberry Pi. When the server load became too much for the device & household internet to handle, the realm was purchased.

To this day, the realm is regularly visited. The members of the realm are CknSoup, RoyalThirty, WOTR, Daradhel, Arwen326, and Goldtop11.
